audit-stats.mjs uses hardcoded session fallback '825' instead of dynamic

recommended_actions.title: Fix audit-stats.mjs session number fallback
recommended_actions.notes: audit-stats.mjs line 74 hardcodes fallback session as 825. Should either (1) read from session-history.txt, (2) use file mtime heuristic, or (3) accept session as CLI arg. Currently causes stale stats when SESSION_NUM env not set.

recommended_actions.title: Complete wq-160 component tests (webhooks.js, monitors.js)
recommended_actions.notes: wq-160 has been in-progress for 5 sessions. cron.test.mjs done (s839), but webhooks.js and monitors.js still untested. These are critical automation components. Consider splitting into separate queue items if the combined scope is too large for single sessions.
